markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 325 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodline**
[Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=27)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 spell effect or unattended magic item
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, it becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=253) or similar item, you automatically fail.
name: Dispel Magic

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<additional-info>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
End a spell or suppress an item's magic.
</summary>
summary: End a spell or suppress an item's magic.

target: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item

text: Dispel Magic Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 325 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Bloodline Imperial Range 120 feet Target 1 spell effect or unattended magic item --- You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, it becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
